schema.news: (title TEXT PRIMARY KEY, timestamp TIMESTAMP, summary TEXT, url TEXT, label TEXT, confidence REAL, created_at TIMESTAMP)
schema.market_data: (timestamp TIMESTAMP PRIMARY KEY, btc_open REAL, btc_high REAL, btc_low REAL, btc_close REAL, btc_volume REAL, btc_quote_volume REAL, btc_trades INTEGER, btc_volatility REAL, eth_open REAL, eth_high REAL, eth_low REAL, eth_close REAL, eth_volume REAL, eth_quote_volume REAL, eth_trades INTEGER, eth_volatility REAL, sol_open REAL, sol_high REAL, sol_low REAL, sol_close REAL, sol_volume REAL, sol_quote_volume REAL, sol_trades INTEGER, sol_volatility REAL, xrp_open REAL, xrp_high REAL, xrp_low REAL, xrp_close REAL, xrp_volume REAL, xrp_quote_volume REAL, xrp_trades INTEGER, xrp_volatility REAL, btc_taker_buy_volume REAL, btc_taker_sell_volume REAL, btc_taker_buy_sell_ratio REAL, btc_funding_rate REAL, btc_open_interest REAL, btc_open_interest_value REAL, btc_long_account REAL, btc_short_account REAL, btc_long_short_ratio REAL, created_at TIMESTAMP)
schema.features: (timestamp TIMESTAMP PRIMARY KEY, btc_open REAL, btc_high REAL, btc_low REAL, btc_close REAL, btc_volume REAL, btc_quote_volume REAL, btc_trades INTEGER, btc_volatility REAL, eth_open REAL, eth_high REAL, eth_low REAL, eth_close REAL, eth_volume REAL, eth_quote_volume REAL, eth_trades INTEGER, eth_volatility REAL, sol_open REAL, sol_high REAL, sol_low REAL, sol_close REAL, sol_volume REAL, sol_quote_volume REAL, sol_trades INTEGER, sol_volatility REAL, xrp_open REAL, xrp_high REAL, xrp_low REAL, xrp_close REAL, xrp_volume REAL, xrp_quote_volume REAL, xrp_trades INTEGER, xrp_volatility REAL, btc_taker_buy_volume REAL, btc_taker_sell_volume REAL, btc_taker_buy_sell_ratio REAL, btc_funding_rate REAL, btc_open_interest REAL, btc_open_interest_value REAL, btc_long_account REAL, btc_short_account REAL, btc_long_short_ratio REAL, btc_return REAL, btc_return_prev REAL, btc_volatility_6h REAL, btc_ma_6h REAL, btc_momentum_6h REAL, btc_volatility_1d REAL, btc_ma_1d REAL, btc_momentum_1d REAL, btc_volatility_7d REAL, btc_ma_7d REAL, btc_momentum_7d REAL, eth_return REAL, eth_return_prev REAL, eth_volatility_6h REAL, eth_ma_6h REAL, eth_momentum_6h REAL, eth_volatility_1d REAL, eth_ma_1d REAL, eth_momentum_1d REAL, eth_volatility_7d REAL, eth_ma_7d REAL, eth_momentum_7d REAL, sol_return REAL, sol_return_prev REAL, sol_volatility_6h REAL, sol_ma_6h REAL, sol_momentum_6h REAL, sol_volatility_1d REAL, sol_ma_1d REAL, sol_momentum_1d REAL, sol_volatility_7d REAL, sol_ma_7d REAL, sol_momentum_7d REAL, xrp_return REAL, xrp_return_prev REAL, xrp_volatility_6h REAL, xrp_ma_6h REAL, xrp_momentum_6h REAL, xrp_volatility_1d REAL, xrp_ma_1d REAL, xrp_momentum_1d REAL, xrp_volatility_7d REAL, xrp_ma_7d REAL, xrp_momentum_7d REAL, positive_sentiment REAL, negative_sentiment REAL, sentiment_ratio REAL, positive_count INTEGER, negative_count INTEGER, count_ratio REAL, total_articles INTEGER, created_at TIMESTAMP)
schema.predictions: (timestamp TIMESTAMP PRIMARY KEY, prediction REAL, created_at TIMESTAMP)
schema.training_history: (timestamp TEXT NOT NULL, model_type TEXT NOT NULL, created_at TEXT NOT NULL)
